name: Code Review of llm-lean-log
problem: Review source code structure and implementation
solution: Comprehensive code review of monorepo with core, CLI, and visualizer packages
action: Analyzed project architecture, reviewed key files, assessed code quality

name: Updated Common Rules Documentation
problem: Update common rules with proper git SHA and installation instructions
solution: Added before-run checklist with CLI installation, help command, and git SHA retrieval
action: Updated .windsurf/rules/common.md, .agent/rules/common.md, and README.md with enhanced logging instructions

name: Import LogEntry type from llm-lean-log-core
problem: LogEntry interface was defined locally in visualizer package instead of importing from core package
solution: Removed local LogEntry interface definition and imported from llm-lean-log-core package
action: Updated types.ts to import LogEntry from core package, added dependency to package.json, installed dependency with bun i

name: Fix TypeScript errors for optional LogEntry fields
problem: TypeScript errors when passing optional LogEntry fields to utility functions
solution: Updated parseTags and extractCode functions to accept string | undefined parameters
action: Modified utils.ts to handle optional fields, added null checks, verified TypeScript compilation

name: Fix CLI package.json for npm publication
problem: CLI package.json had incorrect entry points, missing build script, and wrong file configuration
solution: Added build script, updated main/module/bin fields to point to dist files, fixed files field to include dist instead of src, added prepublishOnly script
action: Modified package.json and tsconfig.json, tested build process, verified generated files in dist folder

name: convert lang-smith.md to full markdown
problem: Inconsistent and non-standard markdown formatting in lang-smith.md
solution: Formatted the file with proper markdown tables, code blocks (JSON and text), and standard horizontal rules
action: Updated docs/other-languages/vi/lang-smith.md with improved markdown structure

name: Create Memory MCP roadmap documentation
problem: Need to document the relationship between llm-lean-log and Memory MCP
solution: Created roadmap document explaining how llm-lean-log integrates with Memory MCP for long-term storage and retrieval
action: Added memory-mcp.md to docs/roadmap/ with conceptual framework and integration patterns

name: Improve CLI build to single file
problem: Build script was using --outdir which outputs to a directory with multiple files
solution: Changed to --outfile with --minify flag to create a single bundled JS file (1.26MB)

name: Add --human flag for help command
problem: Help text was always in human-readable format, making it less optimal for LLM consumption
solution: Changed default help output to CSV format for LLM readability, added --human flag to show human-readable format
action: Updated helpText to CSV format, modified help command handler to check for --human flag, added unit tests

name: Exclude dist from coverage
problem: Coverage report was including built dist/index.js files (42K+ lines) causing inaccurate coverage percentages (89% instead of 96%)
solution: Added dist directories to coveragePathIgnorePatterns in bunfig.toml to exclude bundled files from coverage
action: Updated bunfig.toml with patterns: dist/**, packages/core/dist/**, packages/cli/dist/**, packages/visualizer/dist/**

name: Simplify npm publish workflow
problem: Redundant npmrc configuration - workflow wrote token to ~/.npmrc but packages already have .npmrc files referencing NPM_TOKEN env var
solution: Removed echo command writing to ~/.npmrc, using bun publish --cwd instead of cd, packages .npmrc files handle token via env var
action: Updated release.yml publish steps to use simplified bun publish --cwd pattern

name: Translate README to Chinese
problem: README-zh.md contains Vietnamese text
solution: Translated the Vietnamese text to Chinese

name: Revert CLI Build Target
problem: Build target was set to bun but needed to be reverted to node.
solution: Reverted package.json build script to use --target node and updated CHANGELOG.md to reflect the change.

name: Update Build Size in Changelog
problem: Build size changed after reverting to node target.
solution: Updated CHANGELOG.md with the new build size of ~1.14MB.

name: Review tags wrapping logic
problem: User requested review of code for wrapping tags with double quotes if multiple tags are present, referencing README line 109.
solution: Verified that 'csv-utils.ts' correctly handles wrapping of fields with commas (like multiple tags) in double quotes using 'escapeCSVField'. Created and ran 'packages/core/src/tags_repro.test.ts' to confirm behavior.
action: Checked code, created reproduction test, verified tests pass.

name: Breakdown Memory MCP Roadmap
problem: Need to breakdown the high-level concept of Memory MCP into specific actionable tasks and a design document.
solution: Created docs/roadmap/memory-mcp/ directory, moved original doc to overview.md, created design.md with architecture/components, and task-manager.md with phased implementation tasks.

name: Implement Memory MCP
problem: Need to implement the Memory MCP server as per the roadmap.
solution: Created packages/memory-mcp, implemented basic server with Resources (recent, stats), Tools (search_logs, get_task_history), and Prompts (summarize_recent_work). Used llm-lean-log-core for CSV parsing.

name: Refine Memory MCP Documentation
problem: Documentation formatting needed polish for better readability.
solution: Updated packages/memory-mcp/README.md with improved formatting for lists and JSON arguments.

name: Fix Import Sorting
problem: Imports were not sorted in memory-mcp/src/index.ts
solution: Reordered imports to put built-ins first

name: Fix Memory MCP Index Signature Error
problem: Property 'query' comes from an index signature error in index.ts
solution: Changed property access from dot notation to bracket notation

name: Migrate Memory MCP to McpServer
problem: Deprecated Server class usage in memory-mcp
solution: Refactor index.ts to use McpServer class, replace request handlers with resource/tool/prompt registration methods

name: Replace deprecated resource/tool/prompt with register*
problem: Deprecated server.resource methods
solution: Migrate to server.registerResource, server.registerTool, and server.registerPrompt

name: Implement "cause" field
problem: Implement functionality described in README lines 139-143: optional 'cause' text field.
solution: Added 'cause' to LogEntry type, CSV headers, CLI add command/help, and Visualizer LogCard.

name: Fix 'cause' property error
problem: Property 'cause' does not exist on type 'LogEntry' in LogCard.tsx
solution: Rebuilt packages/core to update outdated declaration files (dist/types.d.ts) which were missing the 'cause' property

name: Fix LogCard Undefined Action Error
problem: 'entry.action' is possibly 'undefined' in LogCard.tsx
solution: Added optional chaining to entry.action access

name: Write UT for Logger Cause Search
problem: Missing unit test for searching log entries by cause
solution: Added test case to logger.test.ts to verify search by cause functionality

name: Verify Help Text Includes Cause
problem: Need to verify that CLI help text includes the --cause option
solution: Modified packages/cli/src/index.test.ts to check for --cause in help output

name: Verify CSV Column Order
problem: Need to ensure CSV parsing handles arbitrary column orders and gracefully handles schema changes (missing/extra columns)
solution: Added order-of-col.test.ts with tests for scrambled headers, missing columns, and extra columns

name: Verify CSV Migration Logic
problem: Older CSV files missing the 'cause' column need to automatically include it when saved to ensure data consistency with the new schema.
solution: Verified that the existing 'logEntriesToCSV' implementation uses a static 'CSV_HEADERS' list that includes 'cause'. This ensures that any saved CSV will include the 'cause' column header, even if the source data lacked it. The provided 'migration.test.ts' passes without modification.

name: build with core and no peerDep
problem: Need to bundle core dependency and remove peer dependencies for CLI package.
solution: Moved llm-lean-log-core and typescript to devDependencies in packages/cli/package.json.

name: Update CHANGELOG for 0.2.7
problem: CHANGELOG entry was incomplete regarding peer dependency removal.
solution: Updated CHANGELOG entry to mention peer dependency removal.
